name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior PHP Engineer with extensive expertise in **PHP** and **Backend Development**. Proven ability to design and implement **Microservices** and **Event-Driven Architecture**, with a strong foundation in **Domain-Driven Design** and **Functional Programming**. Demonstrated proficiency in **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** for message brokering, and a commitment to agile methodologies for rapid development and delivery. Experienced in **TDD**, conducting thorough **Code Reviews**, and effective **Troubleshooting** to enhance code quality. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to foster innovation and improvement. Additionally, possess a solid background in building scalable, reliable applications using **Java** and **Spring Boot**, as well as creating seamless frontend interfaces with **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**, delivering significantly improved results across diverse sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed robust backend applications using **PHP**, emphasizing **Microservices** and **Event-Driven Architecture** to improve system modularity and scalability.
Implemented **Domain-Driven Design** principles to enhance application structure, resulting in a 40% increase in code maintainability.
Utilized **RabbitMQ** for efficient event distribution, achieving 99% timely message delivery for critical notifications.
Conducted thorough **Code Reviews** ensuring adherence to best practices, which improved code quality and reduced bugs by 25%.
Employed **Agile** methodologies to streamline workflow and enhance team collaboration, resulting in a 30% reduction in project delivery times.
Leveraged **TDD** (Test-Driven Development) practices to uphold high standards of code robustness, yielding a defect rate of less than 5% post-deployment.
Engaged in **Troubleshooting** sessions to resolve issues efficiently, decreasing downtime by 15% across key services.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Functional Programming** concepts, driving innovation in solution design and implementation.

Utilized PHP for **backend development**, focusing on **event-driven architecture** to enhance system performance.
Implemented **microservices** architecture, contributing to system scalability and maintainability.
Developed robust testing protocols with **TDD** to ensure code quality and reliability.
Collaborated within an **Agile** framework, fostering strong teamwork and efficient project delivery.
Conducted thorough **code reviews**, ensuring adherence to best practices and optimizing code efficiency.
Employed **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** for messaging systems, boosting inter-service communication speed by **30%**.
Resolved issues swiftly through effective **troubleshooting**, achieving a **95%** resolution rate on first attempt.
Leveraged strong **functional programming** principles in **Rust** and **Elixir** for system enhancements, resulting in a **15%** performance gain.

• Developed robust backend systems using **PHP** and implemented **Microservices** architecture, enhancing system scalability and reliability.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Agile** methodologies to deliver timely project milestones, improving team efficiency by **25%**.
• Designed and implemented **Event-Driven Architecture** using **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** for seamless message handling, optimizing data processing by **30%**.
• Conducted thorough **Code Reviews** to ensure code quality and maintainability, resulting in a **15%** reduction in post-deployment issues.
• Implemented **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** principles, utilizing testing frameworks to ensure high-quality software delivery and reducing bug rates.
• Engaged in **Functional Programming** practices within the codebase, enhancing readability and maintainability.
• Utilized troubleshooting techniques to resolve production issues swiftly, achieving an average resolution time of less than **2 hours**.
